title: FS: SGC graded American Beauty pair - Jordan batting and Murray batting - SOLD

posts.post_title: FS: SGC graded American Beauty pair - Jordan batting and Murray batting - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Have this pair of American Beauty commons graded by SGC last month.

Jordan batting no frame
Murray batting with frame

Asking $SOLD each with tracked shipping. Available via PM to discuss.

Thanks
Jeff
